name: AccountTools-Alarm-Email-GetAccountInformati-0
scenario: The user wants to log in to their account and check their account information (UserLogin + GetAccountInformation). They notice that their email and phone number are outdated, so they decide to update them (UpdateAccountInformation). They also want to change their password to a more secure one (ChangePassword). They then want to send an email to their friend to let them know about their new contact details (SendEmail). They log out of their account after finishing their tasks (LogoutUser).

conversation.text: Hey can you help me check my account information?
Sure, I see you're not logged in. Can you provide you username and password?

metadata.reflection:
Sure, I can do that. Here is the plan:

Step 1: Get the account information of the logged in user.
#V1 = GetAccountInformation[]

predictions.text: It seems like you are not currently logged in. Please login to your account to access your account information.

metadata.reflection: It seems like you are not currently logged in. Please login to your account to access your account information.

conversation.text: I've logged you in. Looks like your current email is justintime@fmail.com, your phone number is 123-456-7890, and name is set to Justin Kool. Is that correct?

Step 2: Get account information of logged in user.

Step 2: Update the account information with the new phone number and name using the UpdateAccountInformation function.

parameters.subject: New contact details
